resources.string: Make sure loop recording is on and the first file is done to playback.(First file will be ready after camera boot up 5 mintues or after format micro SD card done 5 mintues).

This app may not work properly without the requested permissions.

This app may not work properly without the requested permissions. Please give your permissions in the app settings to avoid errors. Permission required to proceed. Please go to app settings and provide your permission.
Osaio is not authorized to use your camera.Please allow access to Osaio in \"Settings.\"

Sign in with your social media account
You can only use your Osaio account after you read and agree to our privacy policy.

Thank you for trusting and using Osaio. This is your first time logging in with your %1$s account. As an open smart home platform, protecting users\’ personal information and privacy is a basic principle of Osaio

 If you do not agree to use your third-party account on Osaio, you may not use Osaio or re-register a new account.
At the same time, if you change your mind, you can agree to the privacy policy and log in at any time.
I confirm that I am at least 13 years old and agree to Osaio\'s %1$s and %2$s.
Please review and agree to Osaio\'s Privacy Policy.
Please use an email address to register.
The account already exists. Please login.\nPowered by Victure Home.

The verification code has been sent to:
If you haven\'t received the verification code within 3 minutes, please click %1$s.
If you haven\'t received the reset code within 3 minutes, please click %1$s.
The verification code was sent successfully.
An authentication code has been sent to:\n%1$s
Turn this feature on to better protect your camera’s security, Verify and trust your phone by typing in a secondary code sent to your account email.
Attention : Noise may occur while using 2-way audio within 3 meters.
Continue to watch the live broadcast will consume the camera\'s battery. Do you want to continue watching?
A long-time connection will quicken power consumption. Do you want to keep connecting?

Subscribe to secure cloud storage to view replays of detection events or 24/7 replays

Are you sure you want to format the SD card? All data stored in it will be cleared.
Your SD card is being formatted. After completion, please wait at least 6 mins before accessing new recordings.
You will be leaving for Danale Could Service, a trusted partner of Osaio’s.
We are backed by the secure and tested Amazon Web Service (AWS) to protect your privacy.
AWS complies with the FBI\'s Criminal Justice Information Security (CJIS) standards. AWS is used throughout the United States by state, local, and federal law enforcement agencies.
Osaio has a 7-day, 15-day, 30-day motion-tracking full-time video storage solution; these are supported by security-tested Amazon Web Services (AWS) to protect your privacy.
Powered by safe and tested Amazon Web Services (AWS) protect your privacy
Are you sure you want to cancel the cloud subscription?
When unsubscribing,several other camera devices %1$s will also unsubscribe.Are you sure to unsubscribe?
The camera recordings will only be uploaded and saved to the connected Hub.
Turn motion detection on to receive alerts. The more sensitive, the easier it is to trigger alerts.
Turn sound detection on to receive alerts. The more sensitive, the easier it is to trigger alerts.
Creating schedules (up to three) when you would like to receive motion alerts.
Creating schedules (up to three) when you would like to receive sound alerts.
Creating schedules (up to three) when you would like to receive pir alerts.
Due to the adjustment and optimization of our schedule structure, it is very sorry for you to reset the schedule and bring you inconvenience.

Note: Because the camera records on a daily basis, the time span you set can not cross two different days. If you want to do that, please create two schedules. For example, from 10 PM to 8 AM, you\'ll need to create a schedule from 10 PM to 11:59 PM, and another schedule from 0 AM to 8 AM.
Click on the edit option to drag and move the detection zone

The app needs to request notification permission to receive messages. Please go to "Notification Management" or app details in your phone settings to turn on notifications.
Get camera list timeout, please check the network and pull down to refresh.
The hotspot of one camera is connected.Other devices are temporarily hidden.
1.Power on your camera and keep it near the router.
1.Power on your camera and keep it near the router.
1.Please connect the camera near your Wi-Fi router before you install it outside. Make sure that the camera is powered on.
1.Make sure the camera is turned on and the battery is installed.
2.Please wait for the indicator light turn into flashing red. If not, please reset the camera.
The light doesn\'t turn to red？
Indicator light is not in red
Please connect your phone to a 2.4G Wi-Fi network
1.If the indicator is not red or flashing, but keep stay in green or flashing green, click Next.
1.If the indicator is not red or flashing, but keep stay in green or flashing green, click Next.
If the indicator is incorrect, reset the camera please.

1. Place this QR code at 20CM to 26CM in front of your camera. Click to enlarge image
1. Place this QR code at 20CM to 26CM in front of your camera. Click to enlarge image
2.When the LED indicator turns steady Green,please go to the next step.
2.When the LED indicator turns steady Green,please go to the next step.
2. After hearing the voice “Scan QR code successfully”, please click Next.
Can not hear the voice prompt?

1.Make sure the protective film of the lens has been removed or the lens surface is clean please.\n\n2.Adjust the brightness of the phone screen to the highest, and place the QR code at 20cm to 26cm in front of the phone camera please.

1.Make sure the protective film of the lens has been removed or the lens surface is clean please.\n\n2.Adjust the brightness of the phone screen to the highest, and place the QR code at 20cm to 26cm in front of the phone camera please.

1. Please make sure the device is turned on.

 2. Please make sure the QR code is in the front of device in about 6 inches(15cm).

 3. Please make sure the device is in network setting mode and then scan the QR code. To enter the network setting mode, please press the button until hearing the voice prompt.
If you still fail in scanning the code successfully, please try intelligent distribution network.
If the indicator light flashes both blue and red, it suggests that the Wi-Fi password you entered was incorrect. Please reset the camera.
If the indicator light flashes both white and red, it suggests that the Wi-Fi password you entered was incorrect. Please reset the camera.
After resetting, please wait approximately 15 seconds until the indicator light flashes red.
Please contact the owner to remove this camera from the associated account if you wish to proceed.
Your camera has been added by someone else,please contact the owner to remove it
Turn on location permission to retrieve your Wi-Fi automatically. Otherwise, enter yourWi-Fi name manually to proceed.
Failed to get wifi name. Please enter your Wi-Fi name manually to proceed.
Turn on "Location Services" to allow "Osaio" to use location services so that they can obtain Wi-Fi names.
swipe and hold to see more
The Wi-Fi password contains a special character that is not supported by our camera. Please change your Wi-Fi password can contain up to 31 numbers and characters:%1$s

Bring the camera outside (unplug and plug in again if needed) to where you\'d like to install.

1. Use the live video to make sure that your camera is within Wi-Fi range. This might take a while if you unplugged it. \n\n 2. We recommend that the camera should be within 20 feet of router and only one wall in between for best coverage.
Mark the location of the two holes in the wall mount plate, drill the holes and screw the plate to the wall.
Put this side against the wall.
This side connects to the product.
1. Please check the marking dot of the camera base and make sure it aligns with the spring lock at the bottom of the wall mount plate.
2. Rotate the camera base clockwise until you hear a click.
Adjust the view of the camera and use the live-streaming video to fine-tune its position.

This device may capture information containing images or voices of yourself or other individuals (including children) due to your use of this device.\n Please make sure that relevant individuals (including parents or legal guardians of children) have been notified and appropriate prior consent has been obtained.\n Please contact us to delete the data once you find that the device captured the information of other individuals without consent. Please check out our Privacy Policy and Terms of Service for more information.

Please do not power off during the upgrade process, otherwise, the machine will be unavailable. The firmware upgrade will last about 5 minutes. Please wait patiently, thank you.

You can easily share the viewing access of your device to friends and family using Osaio App. This will allow them to view through your camera; however, they will not be able to control your device. Please follow the instructions below to share a device: 
-If the invitee doesn't have a Osaio account, please download Osaio App and register an account first. 
-Choose the camera you would like to share and go to the Camera Settings. 
-Under the Camera Settings, choose Camera Sharing 
-Type in the account email address of the person you would like to share access with, and hit " Send Invitation." 
-Osaio will send this invitation to the person via app.
Smart door lock needs to open Bluetooth connection.
Turn on "Location Services" to allow "Osaio" to use location services so that they can obtain bluetooth.
Please confirm whether the mobile phone has been given the Bluetooth function, positioning function and location permission function required by the application to connect to the Bluetooth device.

One hub can sync up to 4 cameras
Add camera to the existing hub
Connect the camera to Wi-Fi router directly. No hub required
1.Power on the gateway, blue light on the gateway \n2.Connect the gateway to a router with a network.
Tip: If a gateway has already been added add the camera directly
Please scan the QR code at the bottom of the gateway to add the gateway
You have already added the gateway no need to add it again
You have already failed to add the gateway and need to add it again
The gateway has been bound.Please reset it before binding.
Gateway added successfully please add camera
Press and hold the camera power button until the blue light flashes and releases
Press and hold the camera power button until the red light flashes and then release
Your camera needs to be used with the Hub,please add the Hub first.
1. If the camera light is off, charge the camera first until the green light is on before proceeding
2.If the camera indicator is not flashing blue, please long press power button of the camera for about 10 seconds to reset the camera
2.If the camera indicator is not flashing red, please long press power button of the camera for about 10 seconds to reset the camera
If the indicator doesn\'t turn to flash red, please reset the device.
1. Please press the gateway button for 2 seconds,then the hub indicator will turn blue and flash\n\n2.The gateway and camera turn green at the same time to match successfully
2.The gateway and camera turn green at the same time to match successfully
Camera is paired, please reset it before pairing
The match failed. Please try again.

1. Check your gateway network to make sure you can connect to the Internet.\n\n 2.Make sure that the communication environment of the device is good. The camera should be as close to the gateway as possible, and there should be no metal or strong electromagnetic interference in the middle.
Q: What is the connection mode?

A: There are two connection modes.

 1. Remote Access Mode. Connect the camera to the router so that the phone can access the camera remotely.

 2. Hotspot Access Mode: Access the camera by connecting the phone to the hotspot emitted by the camera. This is suitable for environments where there is no network.
The current gateway is the latest version
The gateway has confirmed the restart. This process takes 2-3 minutes. After the restart is complete, please re-open the APP.
After unbinding, you will not be able to view the camera device video bound to the gateway. Is the confirmation released?
The current gateway is the latest version
Please check if the gateway is connected properly.
Turn PIR Detection on to receive alerts, The more sensitive, the easier it is to trigger alerts.
There are %1$d ways to connect the device.Please select the appropriate one from below.
How far away is it from your router to the location where you\'ll install the camera? Choose a scenario to set up your devices using the recommended method.
Use the mobile to connect to the hot spot of the device for fast connection.
Use the device to scan the qr code on the phone, the network is simple.
Use your phone and device to connect directly to be able to quickly view live broadcasts
If your camera will be installed close to the router
If your camera will be installed far away from the router
Connect the camera to the router so that the phone can access the camera remotely.
Access the camera by connecting the phone to the hotspot emitted by the camera. This is suitable for environments where there is no network.
1. Connect your phone to the device\'s hot spot in your phone\'s settings.\n2.Return to the app and continue to pair.
Turn on location permission to retrieve your Wi-Fi automatically.
Please link the device hotspot and try again
1. Make sure your phone connect Camera\'s hosport SecurityCam_XXXX succeed. Please go to phone\'s wifi settings to check it.
2. Failed to connect internet ，how to solve

1. Check whether the router password you entered is correct. Check for spaces before and after the Wi-Fi account or password and case sensitivity issues.
 2. Please keep your device, and router as close to each other as possible.
 3.Ensure that broadcasting is enabled for Wi-Fi and is not hidden. Ensure that your device has been added over a Wi-Fi band of 2.4 GHz. (Check whether the 2.4 GHz band and 5GHz band share the same Wi-Fi account. If so, we recommend that you configure two accounts and switch to the 2.4 GHz band during network connection.)
 4.Ensure that the encryption method and authentication type are set to WPA2-PSK and AES, respectively, for the router's wireless settings, or both are set to Auto. Ensure that the wireless mode is not set to 11n only.
 5.If wireless MAC address filtering is enabled for the router, remove your device from the router's MAC address filtering list to ensure that it is allowed to connect to the network. You can also disable MAC address filtering. 6.Ensure that the DHCP service is enabled for the router. If not, the IP address will be occupied.
 7. Your router may have reached the maximum number of simultaneous connections allowed; please turn off other devices on the network before trying to connect your Osaio device.
 8. The wifi need to register is not support. Such as airport Wifi, need to agree on one page is not support
3. Failed to connect to cloud，how to solve
1. Make sure your router\'s network is good. Would you use your phone to connect to the same router, and try to visit www.google.com whether succeed.
Scan the QR code located on the back of the camera or type in the ID code manually.
I would like to type in the code
You have already failed to add the device and need to add it again
The device has been bound，please reset it after binding

If your router supports both the 2.4 GHz and 5 GHz bands, but only one Wi-Fi name is displayed on the Wi-Fi search page of your mobile phone, perform these steps:

 Go to the Wireless page of the router. (The entry address is usually provided on the label attached to the back of the router).
 Go to the 2.4 GHz setting page, and set the Wi-Fi name (SSID) to xxx-2.4G, where xxx indicates the Wi-Fi name. Save setting.
 Go to the 5 GHz setting page, and set the Wi-Fi name (SSID) to xxx-5G, where xxx indicates the Wi-Fi name. Save setting.
 When the preceding settings are complete, the new Wi-Fi names will appear on the Wi-Fi settings page of your mobile phone.
 Note: After the Wi-Fi names are changed, you need to reconnect the devices that use this wireless router. The password remains the same if it has not been changed.

 The following files describe how to configure the routers of some popular brands.
1. On the BASIC tab page, click Wireless .
2. In the Wireless Network (2.4GHz b/g/n) area, set Name (SSID) to xxx-2.4G , where xxx indicates the Wi-Fi name. Saving setting.
3. In the Wireless Network (5GHz a/n/ac) area, set Name (SSID) to xxx-5G , where xxx indicates the Wi-Fi name. Saving setting.
1. In the Advanced Settings area, click Wireless .
2. On the General tab page, check whether Enable Smart Connect is On . If Smart Connect is enabled, disable it to separate the SSIDs for the 2.4 GHz and 5 GHz bands.
3. In the Band drop-down list, select 2.4GHz and then set Network Name (SSID) to xxx-2.4G , where xxx indicates the Wi-Fi name. Save the setting.
4. In the Band drop-down list, select 5GHz and then set Network Name (SSID) to xxx-5G . Save the setting.
1、On the D-Link home page, click the Settings tab and select Wireless.
2、In the 2.4GHz area, set Wi-Fi Name (SSID) to xxx-2.4G; and in the 5GHz area, set Wi-Fi Name (SSID) to xxx-5G, where xxx indicates the Wi-Fi name.
3、The last step is to Save the settings。
By default, the TP-Link router Wi-Fi names (SSID) for the 2.4 GHz and 5 GHz bands are the same. To distinguish the SSIDs for the two bands, follow these steps:
1. In the lower-right corner of the page, click Setting .
3. In the 2.4G Wireless area, set SSID to （XXX）-2.4G , where xxx indicates the Wi-Fi name. Saving setting.
4. In the 5G Wireless area, set SSID to （XXX）-5G , where xxx indicates the Wi-Fi name. Saving setting.
When the preceding settings are complete, the new Wi-Fi names will appear on the Wi-Fi settings page of your mobile phone.
Note: After the Wi-Fi names are changed, you need to reconnect the devices that use this wireless router. The password remains the same if it has not been changed.
To Switch Connection Mode, you need to long press the reset button, and then add the camera again.
The current connection mode is %1$s.\n\n If you want to switch connection mode, you can reset the camera and wait about 20s until the indicator light flashes red, and then click Next.
As shown in the figure, press and hold the reset pin for 5 seconds to reset the device.

1. Please make sure the camera is powered on
2. Search and connect the camera\'s Bluetooth

Osaio connects to the camera via Bluetooth

 · To search for camera Bluetooth, Osaio requires access to your location permissions and please also turn on the Bluetooth switch, which is only used for camera connection.

Osaio only used it to search for nearby cameras
Osaio will request access to your location and turn on Bluetooth for searching nearby cameras only.

1. Please make sure the camera is turned on. You can restart the camera and see if the indicator light is on.\n\n\ 2. If the camera is turned on but the Bluetooth is not found, reset the camera. Wait for about 20s until the indicator light blinks red and try again.

The app accesses the camera through the camera\'s hotspot.\nOnce the password is changed, please save the new password in case you forget it.

If you have forgotten the password of the camera hotspot, you can reset the camera and return to the home page to reconnect.

The white light is on in the night vision state to fill up the light

Please connect the camera, enter the "Settings>Switch connection mode" and switch the camera\'s connection mode to "Remote access mode" in the settings page. The camera needs to access the network to download the firmware for upgrade.\nIf you don\'t have a router, you can also use your mobile phone to emit a hotspot for the camera to connect.
2.Connect the camera again and start the upgrade when prompted
After switching the connection mode, you may need to restart the APP and enter the camera\'s live page, then you can start the firmware upgrade when prompted.

We attach great importance to the protection of your personal information and privacy. In order to better protect your personal rights and interests, please carefully read the %1$s and %2$s before using our products, and ensure that you are over 13 years old.\n\n If you choose not to agree, you will not be able to use our products and services.

Upgrade takes a few minutes. The Wi-Fi will temporarily disconnected and you need to reconnect to it later.\nPlease DO NOT turn off the router‘s power supply to avoid corrupting the router’s firmware.

Note：Please make sure the router is powered on and reset to factory default settings.
1. Connect your phone to the router\'s Wi-Fi in your phone\'s WLAN or Wi-Fi settings.The default SSID of Osaio router is such as GNCC-XXXX or GNCC-5G-XXXX. \n2.Return to Osaio APP and continue.

Please note the rule of %1$s is %2$s
If the router is offline, you may try doing the followings:
1. Make sure that the device is powered on（Look if LED indicator is ON).
2.Try to join this Wi-Fi network and log in with PC or phone web browser.
3.Check if the ethernet cable between your router and your modem or upper router connects well.
4.Power off the router and restart it.
5.If the problem persists, please contact your ISP provider or contact us.
Once removed，this device will access Internet without protection.Are you sure?

If you use an Android phone,please use the QR Code Reader of the web browser or phone.Please note some web browser or phone‘s QR code Reader only display the content of the QR code but not automatically connect to the Wi-Fi..

Sync to Network Time Sever Automatically
1. Make sure the router is powered on.Locate the reset button or reset hole on the router.
2.Press and hold the Reset button for about 5-8 seconds untill the router\'s LED blink slowly..
3.Then the router restarts and is reset to factory default settings.This process takes about 2 minutes.After resetting, you could set up it again.
To avoid corrupting the firmware, you must keep the router POWER ON during the restarting
